title: 04/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 04/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why he’s not buying into the Mac Jones hype heading into the draft and why Justin Fields deserves more praise. He shares an idea for Aaron Rodgers and the Packers in order to land more star players and win another Super Bowl. He lays out a harsh reality for one NFL team that thinks they are building a contender. Plus, QB coach John Beck joins the show to analyze the top prospects in the draft. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
